Storing secret settings in Python

Aug 21, 2017 MoscowPython Meetup Moscow, Russia

Storing secrets is hard. Two people can keep a secret when one of them is dead.

I have shown different strategies. And how to choose the correct one depending on your project size and the number of team members.
